name: statux
description: A compact library to handle state and changes
author: Francisco Presencia <public@francisco.io> (https://francisco.io/)

scripts.build: rollup state.js -o ./temp/state.js --name state --output.format umd && uglifyjs ./temp/state.js -o state.min.js --source-map-inline
scripts.gzip: gzip -c state.min.js | wc -c && echo 'bytes' # Only for Unix
